title._content: [Portrait of Shep Fields and Tex Beneke, Glen Island Casino, New York, N.Y., May 16, 1947] (LOC)

description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Shep Fields and Tex Beneke, Glen Island Casino, New York, N.Y., May 16, 1947] 1 negative : b&w ; 2 1/4 x 2 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 516 Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Fields, Shep Beneke, Tex Jazz musicians--1940-1950. Saxophonists--1940-1950. Jazz singers--1940-1950. Percussionists--1940-1950. Glen Island Casino Format: Portrait photographs--1940-1950. Cityscape photographs--1940-1950. Film negatives--1940-1950.
